sentence.Network_en: There have been cries of outrage about this expenditure.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项开支遭到了一些人愤怒的指责。

all , right-minded' people will be surely shocked by this outrage .凡是有正义感的人都一定会对这种暴行感到震惊。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the senses lack of moderation and violent behaviour): from Old French ou(l)trage, based on Latin ultra 'beyond'. Sense development has been affected by the belief that the word is a compound of out and rage

entry.def: If you are outraged by something, it makes you extremely shocked and angry.

example.ex: Many people have been outraged by some of the things that have been said...
example.tran: 其中的一些言论激怒了很多人。

example.ex: Reports of torture and mass executions in Serbia's detention camps have outraged the world's religious leaders.
example.tran: 关于塞尔维亚拘留营里动用酷刑并大肆处决的报道令全世界的宗教领袖义愤填膺。

entry.def: Outrage is an intense feeling of anger and shock.

example.ex: The decision provoked outrage from women and human rights groups...
example.tran: 这一决定激起了妇女和人权组织的强烈愤慨。

example.ex: The Treaty has failed to arouse genuine public outrage.
example.tran: 该协定并未真正激起公愤。

entry.def: You can refer to an act or event which you find very shocking as an outrage .

example.ex: The latest outrage was to have been a co-ordinated gun and bomb attack on the station...
example.tran: 最近的一起暴行是同时动用了枪支和炸弹的对车站的袭击。

sentences.sentence: "The scandalous behavior of this married woman shocked her friends"

means.word_mean: 2. violate the sacred character of a place or language;
3. force (someone) to have sex against their will;

sentences.sentence: "The woman was raped on her way home at night"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量
out出去.过时,外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+law法律→超越法律之人
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+bid出价→出价超出
out超过.过度+do做→做得超出别人
out超过.过度+live活→超过别人活着
out超过.过度+number数量→v.在数量上超过
out超过.过度+wear穿→穿出了[洞]
out超过.过度+wit智慧→机智超出别人
outrage[n.粗暴,暴行]+ous……的→adj.粗暴的,无礼的
out外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
rage疯狂,怒气→n.愤怒
en使+rage疯狂,怒气→使发怒

Sentence.sentence: You know, all those old films where someone gets so outraged with his boss, He picks up a custard pie and plasters it all over the other person's face.

sentences.en: When he heard the news he reacted with a sense of outrage.
sentences.cn: 他得悉此事时义愤填膺。

sentences.en: The use of H-bombs would be an outrage against humanity.
sentences.cn: 使用氢弹是违反人道的暴行。

sentences.en: This is an act that outrages public opinion.
Members of Parliament were outraged by the news of the assassination.
sentences.cn: 议会议员们被这暗杀的消息激怒了。

jushi.english: The use of H-bombs would be an outrage against humanity.
jushi.chinese: 使用氢弹是违反人道的暴行。

jushi.english: When he heard the news he reacted with a sense of outrage.
jushi.chinese: 他得悉此事时义愤填膺。
